description: The painting work has missed several spots and the finish is not smooth in many areas. I pointed this out but tasker refused to fix properly.
Client is refusing to release payment even though I completed all the work as agreed. All photos were delivered on time.
resolutionNotes: After review, evidence shows all deliverables were met. Payment released to tasker.

description: Mechanic diagnosed the issue but didn't actually fix the problem. Car is still misfiring.
resolutionNotes: Diagnostic work was completed, but repair was not. Split payment 50/50.
